Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.entities.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Enquiry represents a query submitted by a user regarding a specific project. It includes details such as a unique enquiry ID, the NRIC of the user who submitted the enquiry, the enquiry text, an optional response, and the associated project ID.

      public Enquiry(int enquiryId, String userNric, String enquiryText, int projectId)
      Constructs an Enquiry with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the unique ID for this enquiry.
      userNric - the NRIC of the user who submitted the enquiry.
      enquiryText - the content of the enquiry.
      projectId - the ID of the project related to this enquiry.
